entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.6Â°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:57 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:57 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
